title: Kindred Login Theme: THE MUSIC
body:
Wow, a post not about Morde? Incredible! 
Joking aside, I really want to know who made the music for the current login screen. It's probably some of the best music I've heard on the login screen. Ever. If anyone knows who did it/where I can get it, I would be very thankful for the info. Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey Swuft,

Thanks for your kind words :)

You'll find plenty of info on these two threads: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/sound-music/748EyQOB-riot-music-team-update and http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/sound-music/RYMr4vFV-kindred-the-eternal-hunters-official-sheet-music

Thanks for listening and playing!!!

Ed the Conqeuror

> [{quoted}](name=Ed the Conqueror,realm=NA,application-id=aAJWt2b9,discussion-id=qKPvzaZd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-17T23:26:23.433+0000)
>
> Hey Swuft,
> 
> Thanks for your kind words :)
> 
> You'll find plenty of info on these two threads: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/sound-music/748EyQOB-riot-music-team-update and http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/sound-music/RYMr4vFV-kindred-the-eternal-hunters-official-sheet-music
> 
> Thanks for listening and playing!!!
> 
> Ed the Conqeuror

Thanks! Looking forward to hearing more of your stuff in the (hopefully near) future!
